etymology.interpretation: Emphasizes a diet that is entirely plant-based, excluding meat, eggs, dairy, and other animal-derived products. Often used on menus and labels to mark vegan options.

examples.chinese: 我吃全素(我吃全素)，不吃任何动物性产品(不吃任何動物性產品)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ chī quánsù, bù chī rènhé dòngwùxìng chǎnpǐn.
examples.english: I am vegan and do not eat any animal products.

examples.chinese: 这家餐厅提供全素菜单(這家餐廳提供全素菜單)，也有无麸质选项(也有無麩質選項)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng tígōng quánsù càidān, yě yǒu wú fūzhì xuǎnxiàng.
examples.english: This restaurant offers a vegan menu and also has gluten-free options.

examples.chinese: 他改吃全素是为了环保和动物福利(他改吃全素是為了環保和動物福利)。
examples.pinyin: Tā gǎi chī quánsù shì wèile huánbǎo hé dòngwù fúlì.
examples.english: He switched to a vegan diet for environmental reasons and animal welfare.
